TopicTitle: Recommendation for manual input fine maneuver node control?

Articles.Content: So the idea is, in addition to pulling the maneuver node arrows to build maneuvers, there would also be four numeric input fields, one for each maneuver direction, where one could enter exact delta V values in each given direction, as well as a position around the orbit for the burn to take place. This would allow for very fine adjustment of maneuvers, to make planning exact intercepts easier to do and less finicky.
We might get something basic, as we ended up with in KSP1 at the end, but in the meantime, there's a mod for that and it works very well.
